name: Shadow Of Time
description:
Looking for lost memories in the long river of time, are those shadows guiding me?
The lost girl woke up in the hospital, surrounded by unfamiliar sights, strange shadows appeared and disappeared, what happened before i came here?
...
These shadows are me in the past, I am the shadow of the future
As time goes by, new shadows appear and old shadows disappear. They will repeat the girl's behavior and keep looping, helping the girl complete things that cannot be done alone, and discover the clues in the hidden corners of the hospital.
Time is precious. The existence of shadows is not infinite. Please make good use of your shadows and plan your time, look for time fragments in space to retrieve memories, and understand the beginning and the process of everything...
 
Move: wasd 
Interaction: e 
Reset time: Space

Reset level: r

Artist:Ruby https://rubyzxuan.itch.io/
